Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon sends a flowerlike scent wafting about. Well-developed muscles in its legs allow it to leap more than 16 feet with no trouble at all.
Generation IX.Violet: This is a meticulous Pokémon that likes to keep things tidy. It shrouds itself in a floral aroma that soothes the Pokémon around it.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area Three , Area Five East Province: Area One , Area Two , Tagtree Thicket West Province: Area Two , Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area Three , Area Five East Province: Area One , Area Two , Tagtree Thicket West Province: Area Two , Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
